CustomField.description: This is a formula field that will be fulfilled only when all fields for Contract Approvals are filled out.
CustomField.formula: AND( NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT(Contract_Type__c))), NOT(ISBLANK(Project_Value__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(Other_Party__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(State_Applications__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(Risk__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT(Team_Submitted_By__c))), NOT(ISBLANK(Direct_Manager__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(Link_to_Box_Drive__c)) )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: All fields in the Contract Approvals section need to be filled out before this record is Ready for Approval.
CustomField.label: Ready for Approval
